query.sql: select o from Holiday o where 1=1
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Holiday o where 1=1

query.sql: select o from Dictionary o where 1=1 and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat(concat(lower(:code )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Dictionary o where 1=1 and ( (:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ( (:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat(concat(lower(:code )),'%'))

query.sql: select o from Canton o left join o.superior sc where 1=1 and ((:wn is null or :wn ='') or lower(o.wn) like concat('%',concat(lower(:wn )),'%')) and ((:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:code )),'%')) and ((:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ((:scName is null or :scName ='') or lower(sc.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:scName )),'%')) and ((:scId is null or :scId ='') or lower(sc.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:scId )),'%')) and ((:level is null or :level ='') or lower(o.level) like concat('%',concat(lower(:level )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.code) from Canton o left join o.superior sc where 1=1 and ((:wn is null or :wn ='') or lower(o.wn) like concat('%',concat(lower(:wn )),'%')) and ((:code is null or :code ='') or lower(o.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:code )),'%')) and ((:name is null or :name ='') or lower(o.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:name )),'%')) and ((:scName is null or :scName ='') or lower(sc.name) like concat('%',concat(lower(:scName )),'%')) and ((:scId is null or :scId ='') or lower(sc.code) like concat('%',concat(lower(:scId )),'%')) and ((:level is null or :level ='') or lower(o.level) like concat('%',concat(lower(:level )),'%'))
